abstracts.cdata!:
The project would help avert the
            repetition, during the mid-1980's, of the current water
            shortages in Gaborone, Botswana's rapidly-developing
            capital, and help meet demand in Gaborone and the nearby
            meat-processing center of Lobatse until about 1988. It would
            also prepare for additional supply after that date. The
            project would: (i) raise the existing Gaborone Dam by 8 m;
            (ii) expand water treatment and transmission facilities;
            (iii) investigate the sites for two additional dams and
            prepare preliminary designs for the dams and associated
            plant; and (iv) help WUC develop a program for senior
            manpower development.
